item.title: Cyclone DDS
item.description: Cyclone DDS now available! As we wait for the Eclipse IoT process to complete, we have decided to make Cyclone DDS (cdds) available so that the community can start engaging with us in building the future of DDS. In the days the follow we will be releasing some additional contributions, and this is just the beginning of the cyclone. We want as many of you to check out cdds on GitHub and give us feedback and suggestions by opening an issue on GitHub.

item.title: Docs
item.description: Cyclone DDS Documentation At the present stage the documentation available includes: User Manual API Documentation DDS Documentation and Tutorials You can find intro material to get started with DDS DDS Tutorial Slides DDS Tutorial Booklet

item.title: About
item.description: Cyclone DDS (cdds) is an Open Source implementation of the OMG Data Distribution Service. You can learn more and contribute on GitHub. There are already a series of related projects, such as: ocaml-cdds the OCaml binding to cdds python-cdds the Python byindis to cdds dstore-cdds a distributed key-value store implemented on cdds Have questions or suggestions? Feel free to open an issue on GitHub or ask me on Twitter.
